name: Catto (DEMO 2019)
description:
Embark on a quest with Catto! Help him return the Sacred Stones to their shrines and restore Endrea!
Right now this is just a demo; I am making this game in my spare time! Please leave a comment if you find any bugs or just wanna leave one!
You can support me by following me at either @cattoRPG or my art page @balloonpuppy!
